entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kugaaruk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:38 PM MST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -34.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kugaaruk Airport 3:00 PM MST Tuesday 24 January 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -34.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa rising
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 66 %
Wind Chill: -42
Dewpoint: -38.3°C
Wind: SW 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 32 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming west 30 km/h late this evening. Temperature rising to minus 32 by morning. Wind chill near minus 51. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 31.
